title: Jeff Brazier admits marriage problems with wife of one year as they unfollow each other
text:

Jeff Brazier has admitted he's having "marriage problems" with his wife Kate Dwyer after they tied the knot last year.

The TV presenter, 40, and his missus worried fans after they'd spotted that the couple had unfollowed each other on Instagram .

They've now admitted that they're having "difficulties" but say they're still together and are working on their relationship in private.

A spokesperson for Jeff told The Sun: "There is categorically no split between Jeff and Kate.

"They have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together and will continue to do so in private."

(Image: Instagram)

The couple had not been pictured together since August when Jeff posted pictures of them enjoying a weekend away in Manchester with his sons Bobby and Freddie.

Jeff, who shares his boys with the late Jade Goody, has previously gushed about his relationship with Kate.

He told Hello! magazine last year: "I'm so happy to marry Kate, who has brought so much stability to my life.

(Image: Instagram/jeffbrazier)

"This isn't just any wedding, this is a really special one. It doesn't just represent Kate and I putting rings on each other's fingers.

"It represents the fact that we won at something really tricky. We won at becoming a family.

(Image: WENN)

"Before, it was just three boys rattling around in a house on our own, trying to get through life. Then Kate came along and worked so hard at making us complete.

"She hasn't just completed one person, she's completed a family and given three boys a real sense of belonging."
description: Jeff, 40, admitted that they're having 'difficulties' but are still together and working on their relationship in private
